alert.note: Alert for Benton; Morgan; St. Clair; Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 01 at 3:11AM CST until January 02 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Kansas. portions of central and west central Missouri. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from Midnight tonight to 10 AM CST Sunday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear layered clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Kansas, call 5 1 1 for road conditions. In Missouri, call 1-888-275-6636 for road conditions.
